7367577.name: Cup & Ball Toy
7367577.notes_html:
This Chilean game is usually carved in wood. But, this new version, made of wool, makes it more friendly for children, and easier to play.

El emboque es un juego chilena típico. Normalmente esta hecho en madera. Esta nueva versión tejida, es más fácil de jugar porque es más liviana, y es ideal para entretener a los niños.

7372551.name: Fidget Lanyard (Customizable)
7372551.notes_html:
This pattern includes instructions for neck and wrist lanyards that incorporate pony beads, great for fidgeting! They can be made in subtle colors for professional environments, holiday tones for festive fun, or bold and bright to match your personality!

The amount of yarn needed varies based on the finished length you want. In addition to yarn, you will need pony beads (standard size), attachment hardware (D ring, split key ring, etc.), stitch markers, scissors, and a yarn needle.

As a fiber artist on the spectrum, I made the first of these to wear in my own hybrid office job and I loved it so much. I hope you do too!!

As a fiber artist on the spectrum, I made the first of these to wear in my own hybrid office job and I loved it so much. I hope you do too!!

7376071.name: Le streghette di Halloween
7376071.notes_html:
Tre streghette per tre doudou di Halloween.
All’uncinetto oppure a maglia, con i ricciolini da afferrare o con il panno morbido da coccolare che trattiene il profumo della mamma.

DOROTHY (doudou con i ricciolini)
Occorrente:
✔ Cotone baby o lana merino spessore sottile (175m/50gr) nei colori adatti ad Halloween: viola, nero, arancio, bianco, e giallo
✔ Uncinetto 2,50mm
✔ Ago da lana

SALLY (doudou con panno quadrato a righe)
Occorrente:
✔ Lana merino di spessore sottile (50g/175m) nei colori arancio, verde, bianco e marrone.
✔ Ferri diritti o circolari 3,00mm e 3,50mm
✔ 4 marcapunti
✔ Uncinetto 2,50mm
✔ Ago da lana

ZELDA (doudou con panno arancio e verde)
Occorrente:
✔ Lana merino di spessore sottile (50g/175m) 10gr di colore arancio, pochi grammi in verde, bianco e nero.
✔ Ferri diritti o circolari 3,00mm e 3,50mm
✔ Uncinetto 2,50mm
✔ Ago da lana

L’intero ricavato delle vendite di questo modello va a sostegno delle attività di volontariato della Associazione.

users.about_me:
L’Associazione Cuore di Maglia ha alle spalle una storia tenera e potente costruita giorno dopo giorno dai volontari sparsi in tutta Italia che realizzano a maglia morbidi cappellini, scarpine, dudù e copertine, per avvolgere, scaldare e colorare i piccini ricoverati in più di 120 reparti italiani di Terapia Intensiva Neonatale, Patologia Neonatale e Neonatologia.

Siamo vicini a bambini e genitori. Comprendiamo le problematiche delle TIN, e ci sentiamo parte della vita che lì scorre lenta, con emozioni intense che non risparmiano nessuno.

Lavoriamo per sostenere e favorire la CARE, il protocollo di cura e accudimento che contribuisce allo sviluppo dei piccoli e facilita le relazioni genitoriali nell’ambiente alieno della terapia intensiva.

La nostra storia viaggia di città in città, i nostri fili colorati uniscono persone e cuori di ogni età legati dalla passione per il lavoro a maglia e dalla generosità.
users.about_me_html:

Siamo vicini a bambini e genitori. Comprendiamo le problematiche delle TIN, e ci sentiamo parte della vita che lì scorre lenta, con emozioni intense che non risparmiano nessuno.

Lavoriamo per sostenere e favorire la CARE, il protocollo di cura e accudimento che contribuisce allo sviluppo dei piccoli e facilita le relazioni genitoriali nell’ambiente alieno della terapia intensiva.

La nostra storia viaggia di città in città, i nostri fili colorati uniscono persone e cuori di ogni età legati dalla passione per il lavoro a maglia e dalla generosità.

7379126.name: Marble Runner Quiet Toy
7379126.gauge_description: 18 stitches and 9 rows = 4 inches in Treble crochet
7379126.notes_html:
A downloadable pdf crochet pattern for a quiet, mesmerising fidget toy that crochets up quickly, needing only yarn and a marble! It has no shaping, and uses mostly UK Treble crochet stitches, with a UK Double crochet border and slip stitches.

It makes a quick gift idea, perfect for last-minute gifts, or when you need to make a large number of items. You probably already have all the materials in your stash. It makes a unique gift for a child (and many adults!)

The pattern can easily be adjusted to a different size, shape and colour combination.

Please note that this is a pattern, not the finished product.
7379126.notes:
A downloadable pdf crochet pattern for a quiet, mesmerising fidget toy that crochets up quickly, needing only yarn and a marble! It has no shaping, and uses mostly UK Treble crochet stitches, with a UK Double crochet border and slip stitches.

It makes a quick gift idea, perfect for last-minute gifts, or when you need to make a large number of items. You probably already have all the materials in your stash. It makes a unique gift for a child (and many adults!)

The pattern can easily be adjusted to a different size, shape and colour combination.

Please note that this is a pattern, not the finished product.

users.fave_colors: Blues, greens with some pink and purples

7381742.gauge_pattern: Gauge not important for this pattern
7381742.name: Granny Roller Bead Fidget
7381742.gauge_description: Gauge not important for this pattern
7381742.notes_html:
Are you looking for a quick amigurumi fidget where the beads actually spin? Then grab your scrap yarn, and let’s crochet a Granny Roller Bead Fidget! This Granny is wearing her pink hair rollers, pearl necklace, and a cute little smirk. She works up fast and is the perfect size for a keychain. The pony beads spin freely to help with fidgety hands (big or small) and make great stocking stuffers or teachers’ gifts. This pattern is easy to customise with different colour beads and facial expressions.

This crochet amigurumi pattern is perfect for beginners and neurodiverse crafters. The abbreviated instructions are followed by a breakdown in italics making it easier to understand what you need to do in each round. If you’ve had trouble reading patterns in the past, we hope that you’ll give our patterns a try!

Using worsted yarn and a 3mm hook, our Granny Roller Bead Fidget is approximately 6cm tall. The size will vary depending on yarn used and tension.

Materials
Worsted weight acrylic yarn (Lion Brand Color Theory) in
Bone (Tan)
Satellite (Grey)
Scraps of Worsted weight acrylic yarn in
Black
Scraps of DK weight acrylic yarn in
Black
3.0mm crochet hook (or to suit your tension)
9mm Pony Beads (14 dark pink & 13 light pink)
Stitch Marker/s
Scissors
Tapestry needle
Sewing pins (optional)
Polyester Toy Filling
Fabric Glue (optional)
7381742.notes:
Are you looking for a quick amigurumi fidget where the beads *actually spin*? Then grab your scrap yarn, and let’s crochet a **Granny Roller Bead Fidget**! This Granny is wearing her pink hair rollers, pearl necklace, and a cute little smirk. She works up fast and is the perfect size for a keychain. The pony beads spin freely to help with fidgety hands (big or small) and make great stocking stuffers or teachers’ gifts. This pattern is easy to customise with different colour beads and facial expressions. 

This crochet amigurumi pattern is perfect for beginners and neurodiverse crafters. *The abbreviated instructions are followed by a breakdown in italics* making it easier to understand what you need to do in each round. If you’ve had trouble reading patterns in the past, we hope that you’ll give our patterns a try! 

Using worsted yarn and a 3mm hook, our Granny Roller Bead Fidget is approximately 6cm tall. The size will vary depending on yarn used and tension.

**Materials**
Worsted weight acrylic yarn (Lion Brand Color Theory) in 
Bone (Tan)
Satellite (Grey)
Scraps of Worsted weight acrylic yarn in 
Black
Scraps of DK weight acrylic yarn in 
Black
3.0mm crochet hook (or to suit your tension)
9mm Pony Beads (14 dark pink & 13 light pink)
Stitch Marker/s
Scissors
Tapestry needle
Sewing pins (optional)
Polyester Toy Filling
Fabric Glue (optional)

users.about_me:
**Fox Creations** is a family-run crafty business based in Adelaide, South Australia. We love crafting and just about anything to do with yarn. Our mission is to help as many people as possible to access and enjoy the world of amigurumi and crochet. We’re committed to creating beginner-friendly patterns which have been developed in conjunction with neurodiverse crafters.

We are LGBTQIA+ friendly and believe in inclusivity and diversity within our community.

7384864.name: Comfort Chicken
7384864.notes_html:
Let’s face it, we could all use a bit of comfort in our lives. Enter the Comfort Chicken!
The Comfort Chicken is a great beginner pattern, but does require some crochet terminology and stitch knowledge, e.g., how to increase, decrease, single crochet, half double crochet and double crochet (if adding wings to your chicken.)
This pattern is for a medium sized hen, about 8” tall.
In addition to your bulky and DK yarn, you will also need safety eyes, an upholstery needle, and stuffing.
Thanks! And may your journey be comfortable.

users.about_me:
**Hello hey!**
My name is Bread (or Rye). I'm a fiber and visual artist currently living in the US. I am proudly and openly queer and my art reflects that. My page supports all identities and marginalized groups.
I've been crocheting for just under a year, but in that time I have grown to love it so much. I am working on growing a small business to sell my creations! Please consider supporting me on my Ko-fi and visiting my Tumblr to see my art and hear my silly thoughts on various things. I also have a goofy rainbow website where I post more of my artwork and crochet designs!

Hello hey!
My name is Bread (or Rye). I’m a fiber and visual artist currently living in the US. I am proudly and openly queer and my art reflects that. My page supports all identities and marginalized groups.
I’ve been crocheting for just under a year, but in that time I have grown to love it so much. I am working on growing a small business to sell my creations! Please consider supporting me on my Ko-fi and visiting my Tumblr to see my art and hear my silly thoughts on various things. I also have a goofy rainbow website where I post more of my artwork and crochet designs!

7387250.name: Emotional Support Fidget Corn
7387250.notes_html:
This fidget corn is a perfect market make! The corn and husk are individual pieces, so you can pop out the corn anytime you need. Fidget toys are popular with children and adults, and are helpful tools for people with ADHD and autism.

This pattern is suitable for beginner crocheters and does not require sewing. I have included pictures throughout to help you through the project.

Recommended Materials:
Acrylic yarn (Weight 4)
Pony Beads (9mm)
3.5mm hook (small enough to fit through bead hole)

Don’t forget to tag TheKnottedDinosaur with your finished photos!

7387254.notes_html:
Included in the digital download is the crochet pattern for the Beaded Fidget Jelly Fish, written in US terms. This is a NO sew pattern!

This fidget jelly fish is a perfect market make! Fidget toys are popular with children and adults, and are helpful tools for people with ADHD and autism.

This pattern is suitable for beginner crocheters. I have included pictures throughout to help you through the project.

Recommended Materials:
Acrylic yarn (Weight 4 or 5)
Pony Beads (9mm)
3.5mm hook (small enough to fit through bead hole)

Don’t forget to tag TheKnottedDinosaur with your finished photos!

7387553.name: Fidget Snail
7387553.notes_html:
This fidget snail is a perfect market make! Fidget toys are popular with children and adults, and are helpful tools for people with ADHD and autism.

This pattern is suitable for Intermediate to Advanced crocheters. I have included pictures throughout to help you through the project. This is NOT a no sew project. You must sew the shell onto the body. However, it is a low sew project, in my opinion.

Recommended Materials:
Acrylic yarn (Weight 4)
Pony Beads (9mm)
3.5mm hook (small enough to fit through bead hole)

Don’t forget to tag TheKnottedDinosaur with your finished photos!

packs.yarn_name: Lion Brand Wool Ease Solids, Heathers, Twists

7388234.name: Fidget Bead Key Fob
7388234.notes_html:
The Fidget Bead Key Fob pattern combines your love of yarn with colourful pony beads. Made with a handy lanyard clip, it’s perfect for on-the-go fidgeting. Easy to follow instructions make it beginner-friendly, and endless colour and bead combinations let you personalise your fidget. Get ready for some bead-rolling fun!

This crochet pattern is written for beginners and neurodiverse crafters. The abbreviated instructions are followed by a breakdown in italics making it easier to understand what you need to do in each row. If you’ve had trouble reading patterns in the past, we hope that you’ll give our patterns a try!

Using Aran weight yarn and a 3.5mm hook, our Fidget Bead Key Fob is approx. 14.5cm long (folded in half as per the picture).

Materials
Aran weight yarn (4 Seasons SpotSaver)
3.5mm crochet hook
Lanyard Clip
Pony Beads – 9mm (16 beads)
Scissors
Tapestry needle
7388234.notes:
The **Fidget Bead Key Fo**b pattern combines your love of yarn with colourful pony beads. Made with a handy lanyard clip, it's perfect for on-the-go fidgeting. Easy to follow instructions make it beginner-friendly, and endless colour and bead combinations let you personalise your fidget. Get ready for some bead-rolling fun! 

This crochet pattern is written for beginners and neurodiverse crafters. The abbreviated instructions are followed by a breakdown in italics making it easier to understand what you need to do in each row. If you’ve had trouble reading patterns in the past, we hope that you’ll give our patterns a try! 

Using Aran weight yarn and a 3.5mm hook, our **Fidget Bead Key Fob** is approx. 14.5cm long (folded in half as per the picture).

7388277.gauge_pattern: Gauge pattern: 5 dc x 3 rows of fpdc = 5"x5"
7388277.name: Weighted Basketweave Throw
7388277.gauge_description: 4 stitches and 3 rows = 4 inches in Gauge pattern: 5 dc x 3 rows of fpdc = 5"x5"
7388277.notes_html:
Pattern for a weighted throw blanket worked in a basketweave stitch.

Final weight about 6-7lbs, worked in 5 skeins of yarn at a time. Finished dimensions 69”x45.5”.

Great stashbuster, especially if you have pound-skeins you’ve been needing a project for!

no gauge swatch necessary
7388277.notes:

**no gauge swatch necessary**

users.about_me:
Hey! 
I’m Amanda. I run a tiny shop called abundantara and my main hobby is crocheting. I really enjoy the meditative state one can reach while in a good flow. :heart: I have never, ever made the same thing twice! Maybe, with beginning to write patterns, you can make it twice for me. :joy:

7389255.name: Fidget Cactus
7389255.notes_html:
This listing is for a PDF PATTERN ONLY.
It is not for a physical item.

Included in the digital download is the crochet pattern for the Beaded Fidget Cactus, written in US terms.

This fidget cactus is a perfect market make! It works up super fast. Fidget toys are popular with children and adults, and are helpful tools for people with ADHD and autism.

This pattern is suitable for intermediate crocheters (there is a very small amount of sewing). I have included pictures throughout to help you through the project.

Recommended Materials:
Acrylic yarn (Weight 4)
Pony Beads (9mm)
3.5mm hook (small enough to fit through bead hole)

Don’t forget to tag TheKnottedDinosaur with your finished photos!

7402359.name: Fidget Blanket
7402359.notes_html:
This activity lap blanket is specially designed
to engage and comfort individuals. Featuring
a variety of textures, colors, and interactive
elements, it provides sensory stimulation
and promotes relaxation. Ideal for use during
daily activities, it helps improve focus and reduce anxiety, while offering warmth and security. Perfect for home or care facility use.
Create your own lap blanket for a loved one suffering from Alzheimer’s, dementia, autism or anxiety. The blanket, simply knitted in the seed stitch, is made to stimulate the mind with textured patterns and bright colors.

pattern_source.author: Simona Dan
pattern_source.name: A Story in Stitches Ravelry Store

7402549.name: Fidget Butterfly
7402549.notes_html:
This listing is for a PDF PATTERN ONLY.
It is not for a physical item.

Included in the digital download is the crochet pattern for the Beaded Fidget Butterfly, written in US terms.

This fidget butterfly is a perfect market make or classroom gift. It works up super fast! Fidget toys are popular with children and adults, and are helpful tools for people with ADHD and autism.

This pattern is suitable for beginner crocheters. I have included pictures throughout to help you through the project.

Recommended Materials:
Acrylic yarn (Weight 4)
Pony Beads (9mm)
3.75 mm hook (small enough to fit through bead hole)

7404023.name: Big Cuddly Snake
7404023.notes_html:
Big Cuddly Snake.

I have been working on these giant soft amigurumi plushies for emotional support, they are so cute and offer comfort if you need something soft and squishy to hold.

I’d love to see how your Snake turns out, don’t forget to tag NaughtyKnottsFromDee your finished photos!

COPYRIGHT
This pattern is intended for personal use only. All patterns, designs and photos included in this document are property of NaughtyKnottsFromDee.
Contents will not be sold, distributed or transferred to any other person. Handmade items produced from this pattern may be sold as long as credit for the design is given to NaughtyKnottsFromDee. Copyright 2023.

users.about_me:
Ahoy!!! Welcome to my shop where I sell crochet patterns :)

Here you will find adorable amigurumi designs that you will love making!

You can also find me on Instagram @NaughtyKnottsFromDee where I post what I've crocheted!

Your satisfaction as a customer is my top priority. If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions, please contact me and I will gladly assist you.

Hello everyone, my name is Destiny, the owner of NaughtyKnottsFromDee. I design crochet patterns. and I also share some free patterns on my Instagram and TikTok Notes. I'm 28 years old From Canada, and have a sweet doggy named Pandora. Also addicted to ice coffee LOL

7405789.name: Fidget Bong
7405789.notes_html:
Fidget Bong!

These guys are the perfect fidget toys with a lot of beads to twirl to keep your hands busy making them the perfect for those with sensory difficulties! They work up quick and use little yarn.

Low Sew.

I’d love to see how your fidget Bong turn out, don’t forget to tag NaughtyKnottsFromDee your finished photos!

COPYRIGHT
This pattern is intended for personal use only. All patterns, designs and photos included in this document are property of NaughtyKnottsFromDee.
Contents will not be sold, distributed or transferred to any other person. Handmade items produced from this pattern may be sold as long as credit for the design is given to NaughtyKnottsFromDee. Copyright 2025.

7407744.name: Takoyaki Octopus
7407744.notes_html:
Mr. Takoyaki Octopus is a great fidget-friendly amigurumi! His tentacles make great sensory soothers!

The crochet hook size in this pattern is a suggested size, but we do recommend using a hook that is on the smaller side.
